Class CollectionState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xdays.game.states.State
      • com.xdays.game.states.CollectionState

  • public class CollectionState
extends State
    CollectionState.java - Creates and renders a collection page for the player to add a remove card to their deck
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Damian Hobeanu, Mark Ebel, Roberto Lovece, Ronil Goldenwalla, Hugh Williams
    See Also:

      • CollectionState

        public CollectionState(GameStateManager gsm,
                       CardCollection cardCollection,
                       User player)
        Creates the CollectionState object and loads all the textures used in the in class
        Parameters:
        gsm - Gives a GameStateManager to render the textures
        cardCollection - A collection of card for the player to add there deck
        player - A player whose deck you can customise

    • Method Detail

      • setLockedCard

        public void setLockedCard(int level)
        Sets the lockedCards array depending on the level so the only unlocked card can be added to the deck
        Parameters:
        level - used to determine what cards in the collection can be added to the deck

      • createCollectionPages

        Parameters:
